item.title: Rawan add a quote by عبدالرحمن منيف
item.description:
"كما قلت لك : ( قلب الرجل لا يخلو من امرأة ) , قد تكون امرأة حية أو ميتة, قد تكون زوجة أو صديقة, وقد تكون شيئًا آخر. دائمًا توجد امرأة.
أمّا إذا رأيت رجلاً ليس في قلبه امرأة فتأكّد أن ما تراه ليس رجلاً, إنه جثّة تريد قبرًا." -- عبدالرحمن منيف

item.title: Rawan add a quote by محمود درويش
item.description: "في داخلي شُرْفَةٌ لا يَمُرُّ بها أَحَدٌ للتَّحيَّة." -- محمود درويش

item.title: Rawan add a quote by محمود درويش
item.description: "أمر باسمك إذ أخلو إلى نفسي كما يمر دمشقي بأندلس" -- محمود درويش

item.title: Rawan add a quote by محمود درويش
item.description: "هل نسيء إلى أحد ؟ هل نسيء إلى بلد ؟ , لو أصبنا ولو من بعيد ولو مرة برذاذ الفرح ؟! " -- محمود درويش

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by مريد البرغوثي
item.description: "هناك ستارة سرية تحت تصرفي ، أشدها عند الحاجة ، فأحجب العالم الخارجي عن عالمي ، أشدها بسرعة وبشكل تلقائي عندما تستعصي ملاحظاتي وأفكاري على الإنكشاف بكامل وضوحها ، عندما يكون حجبها هو الطريقة الوحيدة لصيانتها " -- مريد البرغوثي

item.title: Rawan add a quote by مريد البرغوثي
item.description: "أليس طريفاً وغريباً أننا عندما نصل إلى مكان جديد يعيش لحظته الجديدة نروح نبحث عن عتيقنا فيه؟ هل للغرباء جديد؟ أم أنهم يدورون في دنياهم بسلالٍ ملأوها ببقع الماضي، البقع تتساقط لكن اليد لا تسقط سلّتها." -- مريد البرغوثي

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Art is the proper task of life. " -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying. " -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Trees are poems the earth writes upon the sky, We fell them down and turn them into paper, That we may record our emptiness." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "For what is it to die but to stand naked in the wind and to melt into the sun? And when the earth shall claim your limbs, then shall you truly dance." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "They say: 'If a man knew himself, he would know all mankind.' I say: 'If a man loved mankind, he would know something of himself." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Trust in dreams, for in them is the hidden gate to eternity." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There are no beautiful surfaces without a terrible depth." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Become who you are!" -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Sadness is but a wall between two gardens." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description:
"When love beckons to you follow him, Though his ways are hard and steep. And when his wings enfold you yield to him, Though the sword hidden among his pinions may wound you. And when he speaks to you believe in him, Though his voice may shatter your dreams as the north wind lays waste the garden. For even as love crowns you so shall he crucify you. Even as he is for your growth so is he for your pruning. Even as he ascends to your height and caresses your tenderest branches that quiver in the sun, So shall he descend to your roots and shake them in their clinging to the earth......
But if in your fear you would seek only love's peace and love's pleasure, Then it is better for you that you cover your nakedness and pass out of love's threshing-floor, Into the seasonless world where you shall laugh, but not all of your laughter, and weep, but not all of your tears. Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself.
Love possesses not nor would it be possessed; For love is sufficient unto love. And think not you can direct the course of love, if it finds you worthy, directs your course. Love has no other desire but to fulfil itself."
But if you love and must needs have desires, let these be your desires: To melt and be like a running brook that sings its melody to the night. To know the pain of too much tenderness. To be wounded by your own understanding of love; And to bleed willingly and joyfully." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Rawan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "One must give value to their existence by behaving as if ones very existence were a work of art." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rawan add a quote by غسان كنفاني
item.description: "!لك شيء في هذا العالم.. فقم" -- غسان كنفاني

item.title: Rawan add a quote by غسان كنفاني
item.description: "لن تستطيعي أن تجدي الشمس في غرفة مغلقة " -- غسان كنفاني

item.title: Rawan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rawan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Perhaps one did not want to be loved so much as to be understood." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rawan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "But if thought corrupts language, language can also corrupt thought." -- George Orwell

item.title: Rawan add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Until they became conscious they will never rebel, and until after they have rebelled they cannot become conscious." -- George Orwell
